title: Heera Jadau Locket with Tourmaline & Pearl Drops - A Timeless Classic
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Jadau craftsmanship.
features: Intricate filigree design accentuated with meticulously set uncut Polki diamonds. The central cabochon Tourmaline adds a pop of rich color, while delicate pearl drops enhance its grace. The open setting showcases the natural beauty of the diamonds. The locket is inspired by traditional Mughal and Nizam design elements.
colors: sparkling white from the Polki diamonds
and soft white and pink from the pearls.
occasions: or festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. It's a heritage piece that can be passed down through generations.
description: A stunning blend of traditional craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and natural gemstones ensures lasting value. The intricate Jadau work reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad. A statement piece that will elevate any ensemble. The unique combination of diamonds, tourmaline, and pearls creates a harmonious and eye-catching aesthetic.
